remarks: Value of description binder ` D ` for a single-valued class expression ` C ( y ) ` (as in e.g. ~ reusv2 ).  Special case of ~ riota2f . (Contributed by NM, 26-Jan-2013.)  (Proof shortened by Mario Carneiro, 6-Dec-2016.)
statement:
riotasv.1 $e |- A e. _V $.
riotasv.2 $e |- D = ( iota_ x e. A A. y e. B ( ph -> x = C ) ) $.
riotasv $p |- ( ( D e. A /\ y e. B /\ ph ) -> D = C ) $.
$d A x y $.
$d B x $.
$d C x $.
$d ph x $.
